definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: I am what could be called a pre-worm.
sentences.chinese: 我處在被稱爲準沙蟲的階段。

sentences.english: The paper analyzes the technical conditions for the safe sailing of Vessel "Sha Chong Nu".
sentences.chinese: 分析探索了“沙蟲女”船安全航行的技術條件。

sentences.english: No longer does the giant sandworm roam free, producing the spice melange.
sentences.chinese: 再也沒有巨大的沙蟲四處遊蕩，生產香料。

definition: Cantonese poached chicken, known as "white cut chicken"
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
Later Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms (386-403)
fish maw/a food dish made from the swim bladder of fish
chicken in rice wine/also translated drunken chicken
Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 芡實|芡实[qian4 shi2]
cups and dishes in complete disorder (idiom); after a riotous drinking party
